newsitem.title: USA: Structural Dynamics releases new product.
newsitem.headline: Structural Dynamics releases new product.

text.p: Structural Dynamics Research Corp said on Tuesday that it had released a new software product that it believed would give it a clear advantage over competitors in the CAD/CAM/CAE industry.

The product, called the I-DEAS Master Series 5, provides enabling technologies for companies developing electronic prototypes of complete vehicles as well as products from the aerospace, electro-mechanical, and industrial equipment industries, SDRC said in a statement.
SDRC is an international supplier of mechanical design automation and testing software.
